targets.query: SELECT mean(mean) FROM "http_server_requests" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$instance$/ AND "uri"=~/^$server_uri$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean(upper) FROM "http_server_requests" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$instance$/ AND "uri"=~/^$server_uri$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT max("count") FROM "http_server_requests" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$instance$/) AND ("outcome" != 'SUCCESS' or "exception" != 'None') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
select mean(value) from http_server_requests_percentile group by phi, uri
select mean(value) from http_server_requests_percentile group by phi, uri
select mean(value) from http_server_requests_percentile group by phi, uri
select mean(value) from http_server_requests_percentile group by phi, uri
select mean(value) from http_server_requests_percentile group by phi, uri

SELECT mean(mean) FROM "http_client_requests" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$instance$/ and "uri"=~/^$client_uri$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean(upper) FROM "http_client_requests" WHERE ("application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$instance$/ and "uri"=~/^$client_uri$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

select max(count) from http_client_requests where (outcome!='SUCCESS' ) and ("application" =~ /^$application$/ AND "instance" =~ /^$instance$/ AND "uri"=~/^$client_uri$/) and $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
select mean(value) from http_server_requests_percentile group by phi, uri

list.definition: show tag values from http_server_requests with  key = "uri"
